title: aipadlegend
author: aipadlegend
content: Everyone knows that tens of thousands of new crypto projects are released every day. This over diversity confuses many people, and it causes them to avoid crypto. AIPad Legend is a solution to this problem. Let’s first look for an answer to the question of “What is AIPad legend?”.AIPad Legend is a decentralized AI-based fundraising platform that empowers to launch cryptocurrency projects and raise funds through multi-chain token pools while growing their community.AIPad Legend allows projects to be analyzed, tested and evaluated before they are released to investors. The platform analyzes the technological infrastructure, team and potential of the projects using artificial intelligence algorithms. In addition, the financial structure of the projects is also analyzed, providing investors with a better decision-making process.AIPad Legend also brings together investors and projects to raise funds for cryptocurrency projects. Investors can invest in cryptocurrency projects, and the projects can provide the necessary funds to develop their business. The platform uses blockchain technology to ensure the safety of investors and projects, making transactions transparent and verifiable. In this way, all transactions can be tracked and fraudulent transactions are avoided. As a result, the AI-powered AIPad Legend platform provides a pathway for new cryptocurrency projects and enables safer and more accurate investment decisions for investors.Low HC, and big FOMO at the door.  Are you ready? 😎✅KYC & Audit✅17M Supply (All locked 🤖 )✅AI-Based✅Airdrop Date: 29 April at 13:00 [UTC]  on ✅ Pinksale !  ⚪️👇Use the link below to participate in the AIPad Legend pre-sale:https://www.pinksale.finance/launchpad/0x33c62861B9166F78a739ED44370BeBe2e312A2Aa?chain=BSCFor more detailed information click here and visit official website.
